Blog.post: At this point in my life it feels like I'm going through so much. Like Idon't know who I am or where I belong. I also am feeling depressions and inner pain I never knew. I don't know why, it's not like my life is bad or anything. I full of nothing but a bunch of mixed emotions and just really upset. I dunno why...but well...who knows...

okay...::thinks of what to put:: i really like harry potter...i saw the new movie 3 times and i cant wait till the 6th book comes out! ^_^ me and my friend sara wrote a 14 page harry potter story...and thats just one chapter. have you ever noticed that once of the twins is hotter than the other? thats right george is hotter than fred...lol only i would notice that...well i'm gonna run now cuz i dunno what else to say about harry potter..oh yeah here's who hot in hp: 1)Ron 2)Harry 3)George 4)Malfoy 5)Oliver Wood 6)Fred there in specific order just to let you know...well...yeah X_

okay...me and my friends brittany were at goodtimes yesterday and we had these suction cup thingys...and she stuck on to her head. well being the blonde she is she left it on her forehead and forgot about it. like 2 mins later she remembered it and took it off. well i guess it was on too long and it left and purple round bruise on her forehead. so i dubbed her Hindu! lol...yeah...it's kinda sad...

yes! i get the fun task of starting high school this year. it's really gonna suck. some of my friends wont be going to school with me cuz they get to go to this early college thingy. also a lot of ppl dont like me so i'm not gonna have a bunch of friends. also i know i'm gonna get teased becuz i'm not the prettiest or skinnest girl either. but i guess if i stick with my friends i'll be okay. plus i'm doing drama and choir so we'll just see how it goes...yea i like to conplain a lot so wtf?

my last year at junior high was the worst. i didn't enjoy it at all. people spreaded rumors about me and my friend terra. also people who i thought were my friends turned on me. i really hated it. also i lost my boyfriend i had for 8 months. i didn't get a part in drama, this fat girl that can't sing got the part i wanted! it was just a really bad year...

happy august!!! yeah!!! lol... okay not much is going on,i start school the 25th and i cant wait! ^.^ yeah here i come high school! lets see nothing has happend, i went shopping yesterday and i got a pair of pink and black vans! yeah! wootness! also i've been writing a lot of hp stories. i havent done anything lately with my friends but i'm hoping to soon :D... well...erm...yeah well i'm chattin to Himo, cammie, shadow, crissy, and ludacris so i'm gonna run for now or till i become over tooken by bordness...later to whom ever is reading this!!!!!!! YeAh! oh and august 24th is rupert grint's b-day
